name: Sarah's Story: Cookie Craze
description:
Cookie Craze is very addictive new puzzle games from BigCode games. Match and collect the vibrant cookies and breathe the sweetness of tangy desserts!

Sarah is a crazy cookie maker. She is new to the city and started a bake house near the entrance to street. I wish you to help her in serving ever-growing customer needs. Switch and match 3 or more cookies, make combos to accomplish targets of each level of fun games. Enjoy the classic game play with rich sound tracks and awesome visual effects. Drip into the sweetened world of cookies and make wonders with your baking games friends.

Remember to collect and use special Pinion and Rollon for faster baking. Just relax and watch for the wonders, a color bomb can do on your bakery. Cookie hammer is the best booster you can use for climbing object of this kind of fun games; remove it from the board before it escapes. Wipe off spreading chocolate to avoid more patches on the unique crafted vessels. Like other baking games, you need to avoid all other distracting elements to finish levels.

Cookie Crazeís Feature:
ï Enchanting worlds to explore
ï Enduring brain teasing levels
ï Dozens of boosters
ï More funny elements to play
ï 200+ unique levels
Treat your sweet tooth longing for delicious cookies! Download and play Cookie Craze ñ match 3 game!
